ComicInfo.Summary: A continuation of Pleasure Bound #7. While still traveling on the train in Eastern Europe, Vicki Faith is bound pleasurably and getting worked over by, Lisa, her assistant. Lisa leaves Vicki to get something to eat and Vicki manages to wiggle her way out of her bonds and silently goes back to her compartment. There she learns her next-door neighbors are vampires. More sexual humiliation by one of the best.
